text: There is a trade that should prepare us for the most deafening battles, for the most subtle disappointments. But it is a woman's profession and it will be forbidden to men forever. It consists of washing the statues of those whom you loved without measure or remedy and leaving buried at your feet an offering that, in time, will have eaten the marbles and oxidized the most expensive metals. But it also happens that this profession has long since disappeared, so that no one knows for sure what order should be followed in the ceremony. FIN
title: Hay un oficio
author: Álvaro Mutis
